title: Crypstal Labs
author: Crypstal Labs
created_time: October 18, 2023, 03:05:18 PMLast edit: November 02, 2023, 06:37:37 AM by Crypstal Labs
content: Hello Frens!Crypstal Labs is proud to announce the launch of the beta version of the Crysptal App - Bringing Crystal Clarity in the Crypto World!!It will allow you to monitor the launch of new tokens, get instantly all details and links and stay away from scams!https://www.crypstal.xyz/A lot more features are on the way: check the roadmap!Have your say on the features you'd like to see in the app: https://x.com/@CrypstalLabMonitor New Tokens:https://imgur.com/g5GoHcRIdentity Contract:https://imgur.com/AwY5MnAIdentify Selectors:https://imgur.com/Wkq9GArSee you there!!

comments.author: Crypstal Labs
comments.body: ðŸŽ‰And here it is !!! ðŸŽ‰ The Crypstal app v0.0.4 beta is finally released, and it brings plenty of goodies!https://www.crypstal.xyz/tokens/Example of the details you get for a new token:- token stages (deployed, verified ...)- links to token, pool, deployer- token details- number of similar contracts found- identified contract functions- links to #dex, tools, socialshttps://imgur.com/a/nUv2K37More details/features are on the way to make the Crypstal web app the top source to get all the token details you need as soon as they are available!Follow or Contact us here https://x.com/@CrypstalLab and have your say on what should be implemented next!
